column5: I had a appointment in paris were I had to spend the night so I hit the river bright and early and had some fun with the pin here's a few pics all were released started getting a lot of smallies around 9am so I left for home .  Nice little bow to start   NICE fat brown my first from the Grand.    and a couple OOS smallies
Funny I had an appointment at the same place yast year..Wish i had of thought of going to the other side of that parking lot in the morning.
LOL this was my second appt so I planned for this one .Thanks for the comments about the brown she was nuts jumped a few times came a good 3' out of the water once.
Awesome! I should do a service call there tomorrow
nice fish, and to see them there.I may have to visit a coworker and a little fishing to boot.
i dont know if its an accident or co incidence but the composition of the first pic is KEWL!!!  nice brown too
That's a pic I take a lot just because I don't even need to touch the fish I unhook it set up the pic then let em go from the net and its just a cannon point and click cam.
Well done on the road trip catch.  Just goes to show. Never leave home without your gear. There is always fishable water nearby.
I pray every night to hook into a brown like that!! Beauty fish, congratz!
